question_stem:
Question 4 (correct answer in yellow highlight)
The leaf node in the red triangle (yes 8/8) means
If a customer has education = primary or unknown, then s/he is predicted to subscribe the bank service with probability 100%.

There are 8 customers that has poutcome = success and education = primary or unknown but there is no information if they subscribed the bank service or not.

There are 58 customers has poutcome = success in the sample, and there are 8 among those 58 customers has education = primary or unknown that all subscribed the bank service.

If a customer has poutcome = success and education = primary or unknown, then we can predict that s/he will subscribe the bank service with probability 100%.
